trends: There have been 62 other sightings in Memphis
There were no other sightings in Memphis on or around November 15th 1957
Summary: UFO called the Moon of Memphis appeared for possible religious purpose
divs: sighting detailsmoon of memphis in mid-november 10pm of 1964, i was asked by my mother to take out the garbage. i went out back and i noticed a brite white full moon above. i look closer and i noticed it had uniform whiteness so i could not see the shaded of white or grey that made the man in the moon face. it was equally as bright as the normal full moon, bright enough to create a moon shadow. i looked around and i noticed another moon bright orange rising over my neighbor house to the east across the street as i looked from the backyard through the side yard to the front. it had the features that created the man on the moon so i felt it was the real moon. i looked above again and stared at the white moon for a few minutes then it made a rapid ascent in the sky. as it rose it became smaller and smaller til it appeared to look like a bright star, then dim star then disappeared into space. it reminded me of the star of bethleham when it was at a high altitude. i was only seven when i witness the ufo that i call the moon of memphis. i had a good memory of the event so when i grew up and joined the air force as a navigator , i was able to analyze the event better with my aviation experience. i estimated that the moon of memphis was at 20,000 feet and was about ten acres in size. i developed this information from watching the ascent of the moon of memphis and remembering that it also pass through some high cirrus clouds that i estimated was at 60,000 feet, at 20,000 feet it would have taken four 747s aircraft parked in a circle to cover the area of the moon of memphis ufo thus creating a ten acre size estimate. when i saw it above me it was exactly the size of the real full moon when seen high in the sky. i believe the ufo or moon of memphis was a sign of god. when you take a thru z and match it with 1 thru 26, you can add up the letters of words and get a sum number. for example, israel adds up to sixty four which got me to think that the 1964 moon of memphis ufo had religious significance since israel equals sixty four. whereever the moon of memphis came from or however it was created was certainly a unique phenomenon of divine origin and purpose. its appearance in 1964 also suggest religious intellect. from voices, visions and dreams that i experienced thirty three years later, i believe it had a message for humanity. it wanted humanity to be more reverent to all living beings and animals. the consciousness of each being or animal is precious and must be respect more. before animals are killed, they should receive anathesia to be allow to put in a unwakable sleep before being killed. anything less is cruel, heartless, and unreverent of that being and god. maybe humanity will find a way to eat without killing animals but until then we must not kill an animal while it is awake. treat innocent animals the same as you would like to be treated if you were in their place. the moon of memphis is proof that god does exist and we should obey god���������s wish for us to be more kind to each living being. [cms\tg\pid] capt usaf\ lt uscg retired
